Prescription Refills

Fast, convenient refills with multiple options to fit your lifestyle

Refilling your prescriptions at Harbor Health is quick and easy. Choose from online refills, auto-refill enrollment, or simply call us. Most prescriptions are ready within 15 minutes, and we offer free delivery throughout Corpus Christi.

Online Refill Request

Fill out the form below to request a prescription refill. We'll have it ready for pickup or delivery based on your preference. You'll receive a text confirmation when your medication is ready.

Used only for secure identity verification
Preferred Fulfillment Method *
We'll automatically prepare your refill when it's due and notify you when it's ready. Cancel anytime.
✓

Refill Request Received!

Our pharmacy team will process your refill request shortly. You'll receive a text message at the phone number provided when your prescription is ready.

Questions? Call us at (361) 555-0000

Frequently Asked Questions

Most refills are ready within 15 minutes during regular business hours. If we need to contact your doctor or insurance company, it may take longer. We'll send you a text alert when your prescription is ready for pickup or scheduled for delivery.

Auto-Refill automatically prepares your maintenance medications when they're due for refill. We'll contact your insurance, verify coverage, and notify you when your prescription is ready. This service is perfect for chronic medications you take regularly like blood pressure, diabetes, or cholesterol medications.

You maintain complete control — you can skip refills, adjust timing, or cancel the service anytime with no penalties or fees.

Yes! We can easily transfer your prescriptions from any pharmacy. Visit our Delivery & Transfers page to submit a transfer request. We'll handle all communication with your previous pharmacy and notify you when your prescriptions are ready.

No problem! We'll contact your doctor's office to request a new prescription or authorization for refills. This process usually takes 24-48 hours. If you need the medication urgently, let us know and our pharmacist can often provide an emergency supply while we await authorization.

Absolutely. We comply with all HIPAA regulations and use industry-standard encryption to protect your health information. Your data is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent, except as required for insurance billing and prescription processing.

Note: This demo site does not actually store or transmit personal data. In production, all data would be secured with proper encryption and HIPAA-compliant systems.

We accept most major insurance plans including Medicare, Medicaid, and commercial insurance. Call us at (361) 555-0000 with your insurance information and we can verify coverage immediately. We'll also work with your insurance company to ensure you receive all available benefits and copay assistance programs.

Need to Transfer Prescriptions?

Switching to Harbor Health is easy. We'll handle all the details with your previous pharmacy — you just need to provide some basic information.
